message:
fix: DEV-1567: virtualize tree data (#471)

* add react-vtree and react-window as dependencies

* agnostic virtual large tree data viewing component

* integrate virtual tree component with taxonomy selector

* imput and scrollbar padding adjustment, fix height on search and browser percentage calcualtion

* removed react-vtree from dependencies, replicated functionality with react-window alone

* support adding child components and couting total nested children

* adjust window hight and scrolling

* null block treeStructure when menu is closed

* new row is actual row, expand parent

* new Items add at top of list, remove unused

* update enzyme-adapter to work with react@17

* update yarn.lock

* trigger CI

* update node version to 14

* update enzyme dependencies

* update lock-files. again

Co-authored-by: Travis Clark <“travisjosephclark@gmail.com”>
Co-authored-by: hlomzik <hlomzik@gmail.com>
